entry.title: Lap-Dog
entry.summary:
Author: Lorfork

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,201Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: When Stiles disappeared with the love of his life two years ago, no one really expected to ever see him in person again.Especially Derek.But sometimes humans have sharper teeth than monsters, and Stiles' perfect happy ending was not as far away from Beacon Hills as he thought. In fact, it had been right there all along.
